page.title: 12My Street
page.content: I live in{Park Road}in Caldicot. It is quite a long street and there are about 115 house altogether. All of the houses are semi-detached and were built to the same design. They were originally council houses but now many have been bought and people have altered their appearance. Some houses have been pebble-dashed and new windows have been put in. We have recently heard a rumour that there is something wrong with the structure of these houses and that they need to be repaired. This work will take so long that families will have to move out while the work is carried out.
